âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ YouTube channel/playlist/subscription monitoring â€¢ Webhook integration (e.g., Discord) â€¢ Process execution on new uploads (e.g., yt-dlp) â€¢ Lightweight resource usage (suitable for Raspberry Pi) â€¢ RSS subscription based
ðŸ“– Summary: Subarr is a lightweight JavaScript application designed to monitor YouTube channels, playlists, and subscriptions for new video uploads. It allows users to define actions, such as sending webhooks or executing processes like downloading videos via yt-dlp, when new content is detected, providing a Sonarr-like experience for YouTube.
